Class AbstractGameServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.app.LegacyApplication

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.app.Application, com.jme3.system.SystemListener, ICollisionListener<PhysicalEntity>, IMessageServerListener, IEntityController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSimpleGameServer

    public abstract class AbstractGameServer
extends com.jme3.app.SimpleApplication
implements IEntityController, IMessageServerListener, ICollisionListener<PhysicalEntity>

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractGameServer

        public AbstractGameServer(ValidateClientSettings _clientValidationSettings,
                          GameOptions _gameOptions)
        Parameters:
        _gameCode - Must match the client's game code.
        _key - Must match the server's game code.
        _gameOptions -
        _tickrateMillis - The interval between each iteration of the game loop.
        sendUpdateIntervalMillis - How often to send updates to the clients
        _clientRenderDelayMillis - How far in the past the client should render the game
        _timeoutMillis - How long without comms before the server disconnects the client
